description: The Eight Dimensions of the Echo Era (Discord Game). Each connects to the Prime Era (Comic Book 1).

dimensions.name: Convergence Hub

primeEraConnection.note: Built during The Long Silence on Aeth'kai ruins

dimensions.secret: The Hub's architecture contains encoded messages from Scholar Nikes

dimensions.name: Shinden

primeEraConnection.role: Ninja Nike's home dimension. He was recruited as Champion - Assassin/Scout.

dimensions.then: Proud warrior culture where Ninja Nike was legend
dimensions.now: Shadow Clan corrupted. Ninja Nike trapped in endless prophecy-visions.
dimensions.secret: The purple mist covering Shinden is Ninja Nike's psychic scream. Free him, and it clears.

dimensions.name: Frostfall

primeEraConnection.role: Viking Nike's home dimension. He was recruited as Champion - Berserker/Tank.

dimensions.then: Harsh but thriving warrior culture. Viking Nike was their king.
dimensions.now: Endless winter intensified. Viking Nike sits on an empty throne.
dimensions.secret: The endless winter is Nolem's punishment for the dimension that produced his strongest foe.

dimensions.name: Grand Arena

primeEraConnection.role: Nike Tyson's home dimension. He was called 'Boxer Nike' then, recruited as Champion - Striker/Morale.
primeEraConnection.nameEvolution: The arena was named after Charles. Nike Tyson was 'Boxer Nike' in ancient times. Both names evolved over millennia.

dimensions.then: World of honorable combat. Boxer Nike was undefeated champion. 'I LOVE THIS GAME!!'
dimensions.now: Fights have become brutal and meaningless.
dimensions.secret: Nike Tyson IS Boxer Nike. Name changed over millennia as legend became myth.

dimensions.name: Imperial Colosseum

primeEraConnection.role: THE BASE OF OPERATIONS for the entire Prime Era war. Where Nike Prime was born. Where the Battle of the Colosseum was fought.

dimensions.then: Where Nike Prime was created. Where the Champions gathered. The heart of hope.
dimensions.now: A corrupted empire built on the ruins of heroism. The underground bunker is sealed, forbidden, forgotten.
dimensions.secret: The bunker still exists. Nike Prime's empty growth tank is inside. With ONE DROP of original CHARLES Fluid remaining.

dimensions.name: Neon City

primeEraConnection.role: Cyberpunk Nike's home dimension. He was recruited as Champion - Tech Fighter/Sniper. Also where Charles Interface Chips originated.

dimensions.then: Technological utopia. Cyberpunk Nike was greatest hacker-warrior.
dimensions.now: Technology advanced. Humanity retreated. More machine than soul.
dimensions.secret: Fragments of the original Charles AI code still exist in the network. The 'glitches' are Charles AI trying to remember the Prime Era.

dimensions.name: Void Terminus

primeEraConnection.note: The Void existed but wasn't a 'dimension' until repeated dimensional breaches gave it form.

dimensions.then: Just the edge. The boundary. The nothing.
dimensions.now: Repeated breaches have given the Void form. It's becoming a place.
dimensions.secret: OG Nike waits here. He's been catching the souls of Nikes killed by Nolem, preventing Nolem from absorbing them. He's not resting—he's WORKING.

dimensions.name: Nolem's Maw

primeEraConnection.role: The space-time distortion field created by Nike Prime to trap Nolem.

dimensions.then: A prison dimension Nike Prime created. Nolem was sealed inside.
dimensions.now: The prison became a kingdom. Nolem didn't escape—he EXPANDED. The Maw is growing.
dimensions.secret: Nike Prime is still inside. Still fighting Nolem. Endlessly. For thousands of years. Alone.

dimensionMapping.description: How Comic Book 1 dimensions map to Discord Game dimensions
